What is next?
=============

Read about `sources`_, `outputs`_ and try to build you own pipeline!

And please, `send you contributions`_ as pull requests. Writing new sources and outputs is easier than you think!

.. _outputs: outputs.html
.. _send you contributions: https://github.com/svetlyak40wt/python-processor
